advancements.glow_sticks.crafting.craft_: Just combine glowing items with glass to get a glow stick.
advancements.glow_sticks.crafting.root.d: Get some light in the darkest areas of the world.
advancements.glow_sticks.interaction.sha: It's dangerous in the dark! Share a glow stick with a player.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_black_descri: Darker than a wither skeleton in the Nether.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_blue_descrip: Shines like lapis lazuli but without enchantments.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_brown_descri: Brown like dirt and just as decorative.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_cyan_descrip: Deep blue like an ocean monument full of guardians.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_gray_descrip: As dull as gravel in the rain.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_green_descri: Glows like a slime but does not hop away.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_light_blue_d: Colder glow than ice in an ocean biome.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_light_gray_d: Almost invisible like a phantom during the day.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_lime_descrip: Glows green like a Creeper but without the explosion.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_magenta_desc: So flashy that even Endermen take a second look.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_orange_descr: Shines like a torch but not forever.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_pink_descrip: As pink as a pig but much harder to eat.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_purple_descr: Mysterious like an End portal and much easier to carry.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_red_descript: Red like redstone but without the shock.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_use: Has a 1 in %s chance to age each random tick until it fades away.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_white_descri: Glows brighter than a skeleton in sunlight.
text.glow_sticks.glow_stick_yellow_descr: Shines like the sun but without the sunburn.
